Mark Chapman is a graduate student in Computer Sciences at the University of Wisconsin - Madison. Currently, he has been accepted to work on BioJava during the Google Summer of Code 2010. With the guidance of Andreas Prlic, Scooter Willis, and Kyle Ellrott, he plans to develop a multiple sequence alignment module and update the pairwise alignment module to fit the BioJava3 Design. A dedicated page at has an overview and timeline for the summer.
